front.title: RPC: Remote Procedure Call Protocol Specification Version 2 draft-ietf-nfsv4-rfc1831bis-07.txt

abstract.t: This document describes the ONC (Open Network Computing) Remote Procedure Call (ONC RPC Version 2) protocol as it is currently deployed and accepted. It is meant to supersede [RFC1831]. Expires: July 2008 [page 1] Title Remote Procedure Call Protocol Version 2 January 2008
